GSD.description:
ext4: introduce EXT4_FC_TAG_BASE_LEN helper

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.6 by commit 85ddefaa901bb74e2d90635f3a0b8d7e1b9ce5f6. For more details please see the references link.
